about_the_game:
Compete like the pros on 13 official tracks from the 2022 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, plus the legendary Loretta Lynn’s!

All tracks are launching in sync with the real world events.

This exclusive opportunity is only available for a limited time, so get yours today!
detailed_description:
Compete like the pros on 13 official tracks from the 2022 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, plus the legendary Loretta Lynn’s!

All tracks are launching in sync with the real world events.

This exclusive opportunity is only available for a limited time, so get yours today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz with 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 / R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 4GHz with 4 Cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 / RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Compete like the pros on 13 official tracks from the 2022 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, plus the legendary Loretta Lynn’s!

English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian
